parameters: \fi\C[8]A log cutting stump. It's warm enough, though. No need for a fire.
\fi\C[8]The door won't even budge. Looks like it needs some sort of key.
\fi\C[8]A log cutting stump. Not sure why I would use this one.
I have one by my house.
\P[1], looks like you finally woke up. How do you feel?
Are you sure you're okay to move?
Uh, yeah, I think I'm fine now. Thank you.
\fi\C[8]"Thank you"? He must have hit his head harder than I thought. He's talking
like that old Noah fool. Good. I have some things that need doing. Maybe
\P[1] here will be a more little pliant than he usually is.
\fi\C[8]"Thank you"? She must have hit her head harder than I thought. She's talking
like that old Noah fool. Good. I have some things that need doing. Maybe
\P[1] here will be a more little pliant than she usually is.
In case you don't remember, I'm Hiram the healer. I need some things from the
forest but don’t have the time to go gather them. Think you can help me out?
Sure! I'd be happy to help. I need some fresh air anyway. What do you need me
I just need some \C[3]Red Flowers\C[0], about \C[3]4\C[0] of 'em, and about \C[3]8 Mint Leaves\C[0].
You remember what they look like, right?
... Yeah, I think I can find those.
\fi\C[8]At least, I hope I can find them without any trouble.\fr\C[0]
You received your first Quest! Open your Menu to read more about it.
You can also see how close you are to completing your Quests.
There you are, \P[1]! I've been looking all over for you!
\fi\C[8]Abner looks really scared, I haven't seen anybody look so scared since that
scary movie I watched on Netflix.
Hey, Abner. You look a bit... nervous.
... I... I don’t know how to describe what I saw, but there is something...
Please, Abner, I can’t help if I don’t know what’s going on.
There is ‘SOMETHING’ blocking the path across the bridge to my farm. I
don’t know what it is. It moved too fast for me to get a good look at it. But
\fi\C[8]That doesn’t help much, but at least I know where to go. Sometimes, I miss
everyone having a smartphone. A picture really is worth a thousand words.
I'll head over there and take a look. Stay here until I get back.
Be careful, \P[1]. I'll wait for you in the Hall.
\fi\C[8]No sense waitin' out here for whatever that was to track me down!
\fi\C[8]Why is there a random bucket here? Maybe it's here for a reason.
\P[1], it's about time you got up. You're not going to let a little bump on the
head keep you down, are you?
I suppose I do have things to do.
My name is Laken. I hear Hiram sent you to find some things. Don't forget to
check inside the logs. Many things grow in dead logs.
I suppose I do have things to do.
That you do. I hear Hiram sent you to find some things. Don't forget to
check inside the logs. Many things grow in dead logs. Come back and see
me if you need some advice from old granny.
No wonder Rada wants you to catch those rats. Have you seen what they did
Yes, I've heard some of the animals are acting strange. Why do you think I stay
The Deep Forest can be very dangerous. You might want to gather your
You want to enter the cave? No can do. Not until Elder Eliezer gives the okay
You're looking for Dahab? That's good! It's about time someone did something.
I saw her around here a couple days ago, but then she said she was going on an
'adventure' in the Foothills. She asked me to weave her some rope. You can
Oh, I see you found my book.
Your book!? How do you know how to make these things?
Now, now, that's my little secret.
Abihu didn't send you to smash rocks without a hammer, did he?
You'll smash those rocks quite nicely with that hammer, I'll bet.
Abner can't get his crops to the village? Oh, my! He lives south of the
Foothills. Follow the lake east from there.
I'm glad you took care of Abner's wolves. They're beautiful brutes but mean.
And speaking of mean, Abihu came asking about you. He seemed angrier than
Be careful fighting the creature on the bridge. I hear he's a toughie.
Thanks again for taking care of those bats. You must have some gift for making
Oh! Just the person I was looking for. I heard that you were awake, so I came
over from the Ark to see you. Are you alright now? You've helped us out so
much, I wanted to make sure that you are all right.\nr<???>
You're looking at me a little strange. Stranger than usual, I mean. I know you
all think my father-in-law is crazy, but... you have helped me before. I'm
\fi\C[8]Her "father-in-law"? She must be the wife of one of Noah's sons.\fr\C[0]
... The sky? Are you sure you're feeling better?
Sorry. I'm fine. But remind me who you are again, just to be sure.
My husband Japheth’s father is building an Ark, has been for over 70 years
now. About 120 years ago, Yahweh told us there is to be a great flood.
Unfortunately, no one in your village believes in Yahweh.
\fi\C[8]Should I tell her that I do?
\fi\C[8]No, I'm supposed to be acting like past-\P[1].
Okay. I remember now. What is it you need me to do?
We are putting the finishing touches on the Ark and need some more wood.
Please go to the Forest and get me \C[3]10 logs of Gopher Wood\C[0].
\fi\C[8]I can’t believe I'm actually talking to one of the people who will be
saved on the Ark, and she needs my help. I get to gather wood for the Ark!\fr\C[0]
I'll get on it right away.
Thank you, \P[1]. You're a huge help. Take this.
I have more business around the village, so come find me when you're
Good job! Thank you for your help!
I've asked Abihu the blacksmith to make us some more nails. Could you bring
them to the Ark when he's finished?
I still need some gopher wood, please.
I still need a few more logs of gopher wood. Could you go get them?
Good job! Thank you for your help!
I've asked Abihu the blacksmith to make us some more nails. Could you bring
them to the Ark when he's finished?
I still need some gopher wood, please.
I still need a few more logs of gopher wood. Could you go get them?
Get it off me, get it off me!
That thing just flew out of the cave and started chasing me! Can you make sure
there are no more aggressive bats like that in the caves? Tell Abihu to give
you a Pick to help you explore and clear them out.
How are you doing routing out those bats? Remember to check every nook and
cranny of the caves. And I'm sure that pick will come in handy too. You never
You've cleared all the Corrupted bats out of the caves? Thank you! I just
wouldn't feel safe with those things around.
\fi\C[8]Ugh, those bats were so disgusting, though. I got bat droppings all over
Using the Corruption Neutralizer, you keep the Corruption from spreading from
